Objects that are structurally similar to JSON but that allow embedding of code.

== Relationship to JSON ==

This is not a document format and is not meant for communication between in different trust domains.  Merely an object message format useful within the same trust domain.

== Structure ==
Like JSON, the format includes several primitive types
  * strings
  * booleans
  * numbers
  * `null`
several collection types
  * `[` serial arrays `]`
  * `{` associative arrays `}`
and adds an additional type
  * [MobileFunction]s
